snippet: Betsy Price of Fort Worth says her bicycle-based outreach promotes healthy living and community engagement.
abstract: Fort Worth Journal; Mayor Betsy Price, longtime cycling enthusiast, says her bicycle-based outreach promotes healthy living and community engagement; Tour de Fort Worth, scaled-down Texas version of Tour de France, stretches along 21-mile course and offers activity in place more commonly associated with barbeque and unhealthy choices.
lead_paragraph: Betsy Price of Fort Worth says her bicycle-based outreach promotes healthy living and community engagement.

headline.seo: In Fort Worth, Join the Bike Convoy to Have a Word With Mayor Betsy Price
headline.main: Want a Word With the Mayor? You’ll Find Her in the Bike Convoy
headline.print_headline: Want a Word With the Mayor? You’ll Find Her in the Bike Convoy
